data.title: Michael Dell
data.text:
AKA Michael Saul Dell

Born: 23-Feb-1965

Birthplace: Houston, TX

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Business

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Founder of Dell Computer

Founded Dell Computer Corporation at age 19 in his dorm room at the University of Texas, and dropped out of school after one year to concentrate on his business. The company entered the Fortune 500 in 1992.

Father: Alexander Dell (orthodontist)

Mother: Lorraine (stockbroker)

Brother: Adam Dell (venture capitalist, b. 14-Jan-1970, Padma Lakshmi's baby-daddy)

Wife: Susan Lieberman (m. 28-Oct-1989, Jewish, four children)

High School: Memorial High School, Hedwig Village, TX

University: University of Texas at Austin (one year)

Dell CEO (2007-)

Dell CEO (1984-2004)

Dell Founder (1984)

Member of the Board of Dell (as Chairman, 1984-)

Americans for a Republican Majority

Americans for Truth in Politics

America's Foundation

Bush-Cheney 2000

Bush-Cheney '04

The Business Council

Elizabeth Dole Committee

Every Republican is Crucial PAC

Friends of George Allen

George W. Bush for President

Grow PAC

The Leadership Circle PAC

National Republican Congressional Committee

National Republican Senatorial Committee

New Republican Majority Fund

Republican Majority Fund

Santorum 2006

Technology CEO Council

Tom Delay Congressional Committee

World Economic Forum Foundation Board

Funeral: Steve Jobs (2011)
